p: Furthermore, the 4-methoxyphenyl-urea derivatives 17a–c showed potent cytotoxic activity against the three cancer cell lines with IC 50 values in the range of 0.42–5.29 μM. Compound 17c was more active against MCF-7 and HT29 cell lines compared to its hexyl urea 16c. However, compounds 17a, b were less active against MCF-7 and A2780 cell lines than their hexyl analogs 16a, b, Table 2.
